name: extract-emails-from-clipboard
title: Extract Emails from Clipboard
description: Quickly extract email addresses from any text in your clipboard. Automatically formats with commas, with an option for space-separated format using ⌘↩.
author: Alex Vasquez

commands.name: extract-emails-from-clipboard
commands.title: Extract Emails from Clipboard
commands.description: Extract and format email addresses from clipboard text. Default format uses commas, with option for space separation.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
